location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Lieutenant William Hamilton Commander of the HCC Nautilus

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage which slightly obscures some of the body of the letter and its address. However, the intended recipient can still be identified.

mods.abstract: The letter is authorizing the commander of the HCC Nautilusto secure provisions for a voyage to India, as the Resident is likely to dispatch the vessel with a packet for the Governor General.
